about_the_game:
A visual novel with a pet healing mini-game about a mythical animal veterinarian, a magnificent phoenix, love and saving the world. Play as Catalina Mendoza, a healer who runs her own clinic with her best friend and assistant Valencia. Will she be able to heal all the animals of a mysterious magical sickness or will the world be destroyed by evil magic? Fall in love with one of the eligible bachelors. Will you choose your rival from university, Diedriech or the mysterious owner of the purrbear Graciella, Maximiano? Or the phoenix himself, Edmundo? The choice is yours!

Catalina, a mythical animal healer runs her own clinic with Valencia, her best friend and assistant. Having an established reputation is good for business but it also means people come to her with difficult cases too! One day a lumberjack comes running to the clinic and tells the story of a burning bird he and his colleagues have found in the woods. Catalina quickly finds out the animal suffers from a mysterious magical illness. Soon she realises there are many more with the same affliction. Can she heal all the poor animals?

- A Spanish-inspired fantasy setting

- Over 10 unique endings

- Fully Voiced by professional English-language voice actors

- A mini-game in which you heal the sick mythical animals

- 20+ unique CGs

- Original Soundtrack

- Develop a romantic relationship with one of the 3 love interests

content_descriptors.notes: Fantasy depictions of violence, topics related to healing sick mythical animals
